folder: Jerome Avenue & Mosholu Parkway, Bronx, NY
text:
(1)  Jerome Avenue, west side, between W. Mosholu Parkway South and W. 205th Street, showing the high service station of the Interborough Rapid Transit Company. The view is south.

May 8, 1928

P.L.Sperr

(2)  The same, at a later date, viewing north.

May 5, 1938

P.L.Sperr
